title: Homepage Load and AI-Powered Animation Performance
description: Verify the Portfolio Homepage loads successfully with all AI-powered interactive animations running smoothly at 60fps and no visual glitches.

steps.description: Navigate to the Portfolio Homepage URL
Verify the page loads within 2.5 seconds (LCP target)
Check AI-powered interactive animations run smoothly at 60fps
Confirm no layout shift occurs during animation (CLS < 0.1)

title: Homepage Accessibility Compliance
description: Ensure the Portfolio Homepage meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, supporting keyboard navigation and screen readers.

steps.description: Load the Portfolio Homepage
Navigate through all interactive elements using keyboard only
All interactive elements are focusable and have visible focus indicators
Run automated accessibility check for color contrast, aria attributes, and semantic HTML
Manually verify ARIA roles and landmark regions

title: Project Showcase Filtering and Case Study Navigation
description: Test filtering projects by categories and navigating through detailed project case studies with metrics and stakeholder quotes.

steps.description: Navigate to the Projects section
Apply filter for a single category
Displayed projects are only from the selected category
Apply multiple category filters simultaneously
Displayed projects include selected categories only
Click on a project to open its detailed case study
Case study page loads with full project narrative, stakeholder quotes, metrics, and embedded video content
Interact with metrics visualization and videos
All interactive elements respond smoothly without errors

title: Blog Article Rendering and MDX Integration
description: Verify that MDX-powered blog articles render correctly with inline code examples, multimedia content, and keyword extraction features.

steps.description: Navigate to the Blog section
Open a blog article containing MDX features such as inline code blocks and embedded media
Code examples are syntax highlighted and rendered correctly
Embedded videos and images display properly
Keyword extraction metadata is present and accurate

title: Newsletter Subscription Flow with Backend and Analytics
description: Test the full newsletter subscription process including form validation, backend integration, and analytics event tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to the newsletter signup form
Enter a valid email address and submit the form
Subscription confirmation message is displayed
Email is stored in backend subscription list
Analytics event for newsletter signup is captured
Attempt subscribing with invalid email format
Validation error message is shown and submission prevented

title: SEO Metadata and Structured Data Validation
description: Verify that SEO meta tags, canonical URLs, Open Graph tags, and structured data schemas are correctly implemented and pass search engine validation tools.

steps.description: Load multiple pages including Homepage, Project case study, Blog post, About and ensure all have correct SEO metadata
All pages contain valid and accurate title tags, meta descriptions, and canonical URLs
Structured data in JSON-LD format is present and validates without errors via schema validators
Open Graph and Twitter card tags are present for social media sharing

title: Progressive Web App Offline Support and Install Prompt
description: Test the Progressive Web App functionality including offline content availability, service worker behavior, and app install prompt appearance.

steps.description: Access the website on supported browser and device
Trigger install prompt and accept installation
PWA is installed and launched as standalone app
Simulate offline mode by disabling network connection
Previously accessed pages load correctly from cache without errors

title: Feature Flag Toggle and A/B Testing Behavior
description: Verify that feature flags correctly control enabling and disabling of experimental features in both development and production environments.

steps.description: Access the admin panel and toggle a feature flag ON
Experimental feature is enabled and visible in the UI
Toggle the feature flag OFF
Experimental feature is hidden or disabled
Verify different user cohorts see appropriate variations when A/B test feature flags are active
Analytics capture correct data for each variant

title: Content Security Policy (CSP) Enforcement and Nonce Management
description: Validate that security headers including CSP are enforced correctly and nonce values are generated and applied securely to permitted scripts/styles.

steps.description: Request multiple pages and inspect HTTP response headers
Content-Security-Policy header is present and correctly configured blocking unauthorized sources
Verify nonce attributes are applied to inline scripts and styles
Browser console does not show CSP violations when loading permitted resources
Attempt to inject unauthorized inline script
Script execution is blocked by CSP enforcement

title: Responsive Design Adaptability Across Different Viewports
description: Check that the website layout and UI components adapt flawlessly across a range of viewport sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the main pages on devices or emulators with viewport widths: 320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px
Layout adjusts appropriately with no horizontal scroll
Navigation menus and interactive elements remain accessible and usable
Text and images resize and reorganize correctly

title: 3D WebGL Scenes Load and Interaction
description: Validate the 3D WebGL scenes load correctly using Three.js and React Three Fiber and allow expected user interaction without performance degradation.

steps.description: Navigate to pages containing 3D WebGL scenes
3D scenes load without errors and initial rendering completes within performance targets
Interact with 3D scene controls (rotate, zoom)
User interactions update the scene smoothly at 60fps
Enable reduced motion preference in OS settings
3D scene respects motion preferences by reducing or disabling animations

title: Animation & Motion System Respecting User Motion Preferences
description: Ensure all animations and motion effects implemented via Framer Motion respect user motion preferences and maintain performance standards.

steps.description: Load various pages containing Framer Motion animations
Animations perform smoothly at 60fps when motion is allowed
Simulate user preference for reduced motion
Motion animations are disabled or reduced accordingly

title: Analytics Event Tracking Accuracy
description: Verify that user interactions with key components (recommendations, animations, newsletter signup, PWA install) trigger correct analytics events captured by Vercel Analytics and Google Analytics.

steps.description: Perform interactions such as clicking recommendation components, subscribing to newsletter, and installing PWA
Analytics events logged with correct event names and payloads
Simulate motion preference toggle and verify motion usage is tracked
Analytics reflect motion preference changes accurately

title: Error Handling and Custom 404 Page
description: Confirm that navigating to non-existent pages shows custom 404 error page with interactive elements and user-friendly messaging.

steps.description: Navigate to an invalid or non-existent URL on the portfolio website
Custom 404 error page is displayed
Page includes navigation options and interactive UI elements
Navigate back to homepage using provided controls
Navigation functions properly without errors

title: Lazy Loading and Dynamic Imports for Performance Optimization
description: Verify that dynamic imports and lazy loading are correctly implemented for large components and images to optimize initial loading performance.

steps.description: Load primary pages and inspect network requests
Heavy components and images are lazy loaded after initial render
No blocking during initial page load
Verify core web vitals are within targets after lazy loading
